overview:
Eventdomain is the UKâ€™s No1 Contacts book for Party Planners and Event Organisers. The business was founded due to the frustration of not finding a suitable venue locally, with major search engines failing to categorise this important information for searchers. Eventdomain is an online database of B2b event suppliers, created to aid the event planning process for the public.

The site only serves companies in the Hospitality sector therefore targeting the companies directly, delivering the correct visitors to these companies, matching event suppliers to event planners.
